name: Super Citycon - City Builder
description:
Huge and unlimited maps, short construction times and a simulation style economy! 
From Gamers for Gamers: A city building game you will enjoy! 

Build your very own City on beautiful and huge maps. Unlock over 150 Buildings of multiple categories, some of them with multiple variations. 

Start with a farm, build your residential neighborhoods, commercial and industrial areas, care about water, food, energy, and waste management. 
Take care of your resident's security with police and fire stations, be sure they stay healthy with medical center’s and hospitals.
Make your City a great place to live with parks, sports, and recreation areas!  

SUPER CITYCON is a homage to the classic city-building genre combined with modern gaming mechanics in 3D.
It’s a mix of tycoon, combined with classical simulation elements. 

Earn more, build more!  The more you progress, SUPER CITYCON opens up to be a huge city-building sandbox playground with unlimited opportunities.

What makes SUPER CITYCON different?

* Our Maps are huge, damn huge, over 15,000 tiles per map! Over 1000 Buildings fit on each!
* Our Maps are empty, with no prebuilt elements. Place things where YOU like them!
* Get full maps! No partial unlocking! Plan your future Metropolis from the beginning.
* Low building times! No paid option to finish them faster! (sorry)
* No matter how long your playing sessions are, there is always something to do!

Made with love and passion:
 SUPER CITYCON is brought to you by Ben & Juan - Ben Willes Games, an independent two-man crew.
Within the past 4 years, we gave our very best to create the most enjoyable city building game for mobile.

This is just the beginning!  With your support, we will continue our Vision to make SUPER CITYCON a one of a kind city building experience.
